Description: This listing is for a Cozart Electric Guitar. It is from an estate and will need work. We do not know much about repairing or guitars in general. But this one has a bend or bow in the neck. Was told there is a special tool to use to bend it out. Please take a look at the picture pointing down the neck and from the side view to get a better understanding of its condition. Aesthetically, this guitar is beautiful for being in storage for a long time. It is 6 string, no cracks, knobs turn. It has brass components. Sounds good. Cords on the inside look in good condition. Needs some cleaning from all the dust. There is a spot on the side of the neck that looks like it might have hit something and was repaired at one time, or the paint was rubbed off. There is a picture of that as well, it is the white spot. Other than the spot and neck bend, it is a very beautiful guitar. It measures approximately 42" high and approximately 16" at the widest part of the body across the front. Please look at the pictures for the most accurate description for yourself. If you have any questions please email us. We will give you the most accurate information we can, but we are not experts in guitars by no means. Again it will need work and cleaning, but as it stands, it is a very attractive guitar. Thank you for looking and Happy Holidays.
Title: Cozart Custom Hand Made Bright Red Semi-hollow Electric Guitar 6 String Brass
